staxel.village.dialogue.tourists.SmartTo: Oh... I think I might not have made myself properly clear.
I said I'd love a nice ^c:1486b0;salad^c:pop;.
To, you know, judge the investment potential of the island.
I thought you'd have gone back to whatever it is you do by now.
Mmm...not bad, man! I can practically taste the healing organic-ness!
I like you, villager. I think we could be friends.
The village isn't too bad either! Just tear down a few of the buildings here and there...
Get a nice glass office in. A resort.
I'll make a note, man! Maybe I'll see you when we next roll on by!
Hey man! You one of the locals?
Loving the artworks man, loving them!
So what can you tell me about the place? Good waves? Nice beaches?
Think we could look to build a fab resort out here someday? Catch my drift?
Actually...what's the grub around here like?
Think you could hook me up with something delish?
